p: Calcofluor-white (Sigma-Aldrich, St. Louis, MO, USA) and propidium iodide (Sigma-Aldrich, St. Louis, MO, USA) dyes were used to evaluated the activity of the essential oil on the cell wall integrity of the C. albicans. Concentrations of 2 and 10 mg/mL of the essential oil was used, while a tube without treatment with the essential oil was used as a control.
